Title: Requires lessors to provide a copy of a lease agreement upon written request of a residential lessee
Summary: Requires lessors or their authorized agent to provide a copy of a lease agreement upon written request of a residential lessee within thirty calendar days from the date of such request.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring lessors to provide a copy of a lease agreement upon written request of a residential lessee
